summary: This bill, the Realizing Engineering, Science, and Technology Opportunities by Restoring Exclusive Patent Rights Act of 2025, aims to amend Title 35 of the United States Code concerning patents. It seeks to establish a rebuttable presumption that a permanent injunction should be granted in cases of patent infringement, particularly focusing on continuing or willful infringement. The bill emphasizes the importance of patent protection for maintaining US competitiveness and aims to restore what it views as the traditional practice of granting injunctive relief.
